text: The 2019 Maryland Terrapins baseball team was a baseball team that represented University of Maryland, College Park in the 2019 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Terrapins were members of the Big Ten Conference (B1G) and played their home games at Shipley Field in College Park, Maryland. They were led by second-year head coach Rob Vaughn. ==Previous season== The Terrapins finished the 2018 NCAA Division I baseball season 24–30 overall (9–14 conference) and ninth place in conference standings, failing to qualify for the Conference Tournament or the NCAA Tournament. ===MLB Draft=== The following Terrapins on the 2018 roster were selected in the 2018 Major League Baseball draft: {| class="wikitable collapsible" ! colspan="7" | List of Drafted Players |- ! Name !! 2018 Class !! Pos. !! Team !! Round !!
